name: Acid Burst
validUse:
-f "Meta|**Damage**: #dice#
**DC**: #dc#" #targetOutput# -f "#counterChange#" -f "Effect|When you take the Attack action on your turn, you can replace one of your attacks with a sudden and violent expulsion of acidic fluid. You expend a superiority die, and cause all creatures within a 15-foot cone originating from you to make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, they take damage equal to the number rolled on your superiority die plus your maneuver modifier."

name: All In
validUse: -f "Meta|**Roll**: #dice#" -f "#counterChange#" -f "Effect|When you make an attack roll, and the result is less than 20, you can expend a superiority die and roll it, adding it to the roll. If the resulting sum is 20 or 23, the attack is considered a critical hit."

name: Blind Luck
validUse: -f "Meta|**Roll**: #dice#" -f "#counterChange#" -f "Effect|When you fail an ability check, you can expend a superiority die. If the result of your ability check plus the superiority die is within a range equal to half your proficiency bonus (rounded down) above or below the checkâ€™s DC, you pass the check instead."

name: Double Bluff
validUse: -f "Meta|**Roll**: #dice#" -f "#counterChange#" -f "Effect|If on the same round of combat that you have missed a weapon attack, an enemy also misses you with a weapon attack, you can expend a superiority die and make a single weapon attack, adding the results of your superiority die to both the attack and damage rolls."
